titles.title: A resolution in support of the restoration of democratic government in Burma.

action.text: House Committee on Foreign Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/7/1988--Introduced. Pays tribute to the Burmese people for their courage and commitment in supporting the restoration of democracy. Condemns the killing of unarmed demonstrators. Urges the Government of Burma to refrain from using force against peaceful protesters. Supports the restoration of democracy in Burma. Urges the establishment of a transitional body to facilitate the establishment of a democratic government. Urges appropriate third parties to consider favorably requests to facilitate the departure of present or former Burmese officials. Calls upon the executive branch to review U.S. assistance programs in Burma. Expresses willingness to consider proposals to assist Burma's economic recovery.
